alert.note: Alert for Manua; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 24 at 7:03PM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...Wind Advisory is now in effect through Monday evening... * Active thunderstorms embedded within the South Pacific Convergence Zone will hold strong and gusty winds over the territory. * TIMING...through Monday evening * IMPACTS...Expect possible downed tree limbs as well as shifting of loose and unsecured small objects due to strong winds. Gusty winds will make driving difficult and may cause hazardous conditions for mariners. FAUTUAGA MO SAVILI MALOLOSI OFISA O LE TAU PAGO PAGO AS 703 AFIAFI ASO SA TESEMA 24 2023 ...Ua iai nei Fautuaga mo Savili Malolosi seia oo i le afiafi o le Aso Gafua... * O le tele o faititili o loo lata mai pe o loo i luga o le atunuu o le a tumau ai savili malolosi ma le faata`uta`u. * TAIMI...seia oo i le afiafi o le Aso Gafua * NOFOAGA AAFIA...E pau`u ai laau, lelea mea totino e le`i faamaumauina ma faaleagaina ai apa ma taualuga o fale. Savili malolosi e mafai ona faafaigata ai ona faafoe taavale, ae maise lava taavale maualuluga. E sousou fo`i le sami ona o le malolosi o savili. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... O le uiga o le fautuaga mo savili malolosi o savili e 25 i le 35 mph ma malolosi atu i taimi e agi faata`uta`u ai ua taunuu mai i luga o le atunu`u. O nei savili e malolosi atu i nofoaga maualuluga. O le a faafaigata ai fo`i ona faafoe taavale i luga o le auala tele, ae maise taavale tetele ma le maualuluga. Ia faautagia mai lenei fautuaga.
info.instruction: A wind advisory means that winds of 25 to 35 mph with higher gusts are expected. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.
